attributes.action: Protect women's right to have legal abortions in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Over the past few months various Conservative MPs have come out saying they disagree with women having full right to bodily autonomy, as well as the British Government organised a multinational statement committing to fundamental rights of women and girls has been amended to remove references of sexual and reproductive rights - which is understandably is extremely alarming. We want to be ensured that as women, our right to body autonomy is secured.
attributes.background: Since the American Supreme Court have over turned Roe V Wade, there have been many conversations regarding the protection of abortion rights within the United Kingdom. As a result, many women have been concerned about their right to bodily autonomy.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Include abortion rights in the Bill of Rights: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619334

Decriminalise abortion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619159
